description: Fixed CPU batch size bug (100 â†’ 50) by eliminating magic numbers. Root cause: commit 06f0693 updated constants in embeddings.rs but missed 4 hardcoded values in mod.rs (lines 109, 160, 214, 297). Solution: extracted DEFAULT_BATCH_SIZE constant and replaced all 4 instances. This prevents future regressions from code duplication. All batch sizing tests passing.
